title: A technique to count anything in Power Query and some in DAX too
excerpt: In todays video I will show you a technique to count any text in a cell in Power query and DAX.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
